summary: A documentary that investigates incidents of hunger experienced by millions of Americans, and proposed solutions to the problem.
cast: Adam Appelhanz|David Beckmann|Joel Berg|William Booker|Jeff Bridges|J. Larry Brown|Odessa Cherry|Mariana Chilton|Tom Colicchio|Ken Cook|Ann Cooper|Ree Harris|Barbie Izquierdo|Joel Long|James McGovern|Marion Nestle|Leslie Nichols|Raj Patel|Janet Poppendieck|Alfio Rausa|Bill Shore|Jonathan Stein|Tom Vilsack|Bob Wilson
title: A Place at the Table
